title.rendered: Suryakumar Yadav is in “red hot form”, he’s the player to watch out for in T20 WC: Dale Steyn

content.rendered:
Former South Africa cricketer Dale Steyn has said that India’s Suryakumar Yadav is in “red hot form” and he’s the player to watch out for in the upcoming Australia T20 World Cup.

The 39-year-old SA pacer said, He’s a wonderful 360 player, and reminds me of AB de Villiers.

Dale Steyn

Suryakumar has scored three fifties in his last four T20 games- 50 off 33 balls (in the first T20 against SA on 28 Sep), 61 off 22 balls (in the second T20 against SA on 2 Oct), 69 off 36 balls (in the third T20 against Australia on 25 Sep).

Read also:Sorry for the inconvenience: Harbhajan Singh responds after Shardul Thakur complains about missing luggage
